name: Run Once Task Execution as Configured in Registry
description: This rule detects the execution of Run Once task as configured in the registry
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.executable:*\\runonce.exe OR process.pe.description:Run\ Once\ Wrapper) AND process.command_line:*\ \/AlternateShellStartup*)`
